title: Bobby Announced His New Book! + Amy Interviews Daughter on Her Wanting to Chaperone Dance + Listener Needs Help With Boyfriend Who Is Doing Something Suspicious + Songs We Could Listen to Forever
itunes:title: Bobby Announced His New Book! + Amy Interviews Daughter on Her Wanting to Chaperone Dance + Listener Needs Help With Boyfriend Who Is Doing Something Suspicious + Songs We Could Listen to Forever
description:
Bobby announced his new book! You can pre-order HERE. Amy recorded a conversation with her daughter interviewing her about her feelings on her volunteering to be a chaperone at her first school dance. Bobby takes a call from a listener who needs help with her boyfriend who out of nowhere has been sleeping on the couch. She wants to know if that’s suspicious to us. Bobby, Amy and Eddie share ONE song they could listen to forever and not get tired of.

 

Pre-Order Bobby’s Book:

https://bobbybones.iheart.com/featured/bobby-bones/content/2022-01-19-bobbys-new-kids-book-stanley-the-dog-is-available-for-pre-order-now/

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
